New Records: The Kansas City Royals became the first team since the Miami Marlins to lose 100 games in a season and still win a playoff series the following year
Key Match Events: The Royals won both games in the Wild Card series with scores of 1-0 and 2-1, with Bobby Witt Jr. delivering the go-ahead single in both contests
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals' manager highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals' turnaround from a losing season to making the playoffs was a significant achievement
